headline: BlackRock's AUM Touches Record $13.46T as Q3 Earnings Top Estimates
summary: BLK's 3Q25 revenues grow 25.2% year over year, driven by a record AUM balance.

raw.headline: BlackRock's AUM Touches Record $13.46T as Q3 Earnings Top Estimates

headline: Blackstone Joins Race to Bring Private Assets to 401(k) Market
summary: The investment giant readies a new business unit after President Trump issues an executive order regarding the inclusion of private assets in retirement plans.

raw.headline: Blackstone Joins Race to Bring Private Assets to 401(k) Market
raw.summary: The investment giant readies a new business unit after President Trump issues an executive order regarding the inclusion of private assets in retirement plans.

headline: Is Now the Time to Reassess Blackstone After Possible Big Yellow Group Bid?
summary: Trying to figure out what’s next for Blackstone stock? You’re not alone. Whether you’ve been riding out the market’s ups and downs or just now considering jumping in, it’s only natural to feel a bit torn on what to do. Over the last month, Blackstone shares have retreated by 9.6%, following a relatively flat performance over the past week, and a mild decline of 5.6% so far this year. If we zoom out, the story gets a lot brighter: the stock has returned 7.7% over the past year, 99.4% over...
